div.p: OBRECHT GeorgiusGeorgius Strasbourg, A. Bertrams.d. Disputatio DE PATROCINIO PVPILLORVM: Qua diffusa, utilis& amp; quotidiana tutelarum materia, brevi Methodo conscripta continetur. In inclyta ArgentoratensiumAca¬ demia publici ex- ercitii causa proposita à GEORGIO OBRECHTO MICHAELE BEVTEROGEORGIO OBRECHTO IC. Respondente lOANNE Argentinensi.( Vign.) Prov. inconnue. 1642 OBRECHT GeorgiusGeorgius Strasbourg, A. Bertram1585 Exercitium luris Practicum: E QVO ORDOET FOR¬ MVLAE IVDICII MAGNA EX PARTE COGNOSCI POSSVNT:] IN INCLYTA ARGENTORATEN- sium Academia publicè institutum A GEORGIO OBRECHTO MICHAELE BEVTEROGEORGIO OBRECHTOI C.& amp; Academiae Antecessore.
